alert.note: Alert for Adams; Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 05 at 3:26PM CST until March 05 at 4:15PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Northwestern Taylor County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 415 PM CST. * At 325 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southeast of Villisca, or 10 miles southwest of Corning, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Corning around 340 PM CST. Lenox around 345 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
